head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LUBART, ALFRED, M.D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LUBART, ALFRED, M.D.

block.p: LUBART-Alfred, M.D. Beloved husband of Hilda. Devoted father of Marian Sue, our blessed memory, Mitchell, Matthew and Daniel. Cherished grandfather of seven. Services today, 1 PM, at Levayah Garlick Funeral Home, 1091 Yonkers Ave., Yonkers, NY. In lieu of flowers contributions to Jewish Community Center, Route 39, Sherman, CT 06784; Mt. Kisco Hebrew Congregation Building Fund, 15 Stewart Pl., Mt. Kisco, NY 10549.
